DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess an investigational medication for patients with severe primary hyperparathyroidism or parathyroid cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of an Investigational Medication for Severe Primary Hyperparathyroidism or Parathyroid Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients must have parathyroid carcinoma or severe primary hyperparathyroidism; * Abnormally elevated calcium levels above 12.5 mg/dL; * Not be pregnant or nursing; * Not have had any type of cancer other than parathyroid carcinoma within the last 5 years.
